page.title: 06FAIR OAK SCHOOL COMPLEX
page.content: Fair Oak must be rather unique as far as the organisation of it's schools is concerned for on the one campus we have the facility for children to attend a pre-school play group, an infant school from 5-7, a junior school from 7-11 and a secondary school from 11-16. In all there are nearly 2000 children pursuing their various educational needs on this very busy school site. Children over the age of 16 who wish to continue their full-time education go into Eastleigh to attend the Barton Peveril College of Further Education. In addition to catering for the needs of Fair Oak children, children from Horton Heath and some from Bishopstoke attend the Infant and Junior schools.
